Hyakumannen Chikyuu no Tabi Bander Book
Tezuka Osamu ga Kieta?! 20 Seiki Saigo no Kaijiken

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch34134 [Atom] is created by http://anidb.net/ch34144 [Dr. Tenma] as a replacement for his human son Tobio following the boy`s death in a car accident. Despite his best of intentions, Tenma soon becomes frustrated that Atom never grows any taller and continues to make mistakes as he learns to harness his robot powers. In a moment of mental weakness, Tenma sells Atom to the owner of the Robot Circus, but is soon rescued by the newly appointed head of the Ministry of Science, the kindly http://anidb.net/ch34143 [Dr. Ochanomizu]. In the adventures to come, Atom proves himself time and again, helping with rogue robots, desperate criminals, missions to other planets and even finding time to attend school. Along the way he is helped by his teacher, http://anidb.net/ch35816 [Shunsaku "Higeoyaji" Ban], his friends, his sister http://anidb.net/ch16593 [Uran] and the rest of his robot family.

externalentity.identifier: 鉄腕アトム_(アニメ第1作)

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: android
tag.description: An android is a robot or synthetic organism designed to look and act like a human.

tag.name: robot
tag.description: A robot is an automatically guided machine, able to do tasks on its own. Another common characteristic is that by its appearance or movements, a robot often conveys a sense that it has intent or agency of its own. Not to be confused with android (human-like robot).

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: mecha
tag.description: Mecha in Japanese basically means mechanical things; everything from an electric whisk or a car to a spaceship or a robot. Here however we limit it to the more exotic things usually referred to as mecha anime: robots, whether controlled by a human or not, and their ilk. See Androids, Piloted Robots, Power Suits, Robot Helpers, Transforming Robots for a more specific classification.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: superhero
tag.description: In modern popular fiction, a superhero is a type of costumed heroic character who possesses supernatural or superhuman powers and who is dedicated to fighting crime, protecting the public, and usually battling supervillains. A female superhero is sometimes called a superheroine. Fiction centered on such characters, especially in American comic books since the 1930s, is known as superhero fiction. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: adapted into JDrama
tag.description: This anime is a http://anidb.net/t2797 [new original work], and it has been adapted into a JDrama. A JDrama (Japanese drama), also called "terebi dorama" ("television drama") or "dorama" for short, is a Japanese live action television series. Japan produces many drama series every year, from a huge variety of genres. Like anime, they generally air in three-month seasons or multiples thereof, with new shows airing every season. Some kinds of drama, especially the morning or afternoon ones, tend to be broadcast daily, while evening ones tend to be broadcast weekly, also like anime. In exceedingly rare instances, a specific episode of a new original work anime can also be adapted.

tag.name: black and white
tag.description: Some or all of this anime is in black and white, typical of older anime made before ~1960. Some modern anime may intentionally shift to black and white for certain scenes or episodes as an artistic effect.

tag.name: human-replacement robots
tag.description: In an usually sci-fi setting robots, or quite probably actually androids, take the place of humans. Examples: Humans have become infertile and androids now take the place of children. Or it may be a more sinister undermining of human society by artificial intelligence.

tag.name: perpetual ongoing
tag.description: No end in sight! No matter what the genre may be or what the storyline consists of, this series just keeps on going... and on... and on. The obvious downside to this is the lack of story-related focus, usually some vague goal is simply never reached. This lack of conclusion can tend to annoy, making the whole series pretty much pointless. Examples: One Piece, Naruto, Bleach, Detective Conan, Dragon Ball (Z), or Pocket Monsters (Pokemon).

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: adapted into other media
tag.description: This anime is a http://anidb.net/t2797 [new original work], and it has been adapted into other media formats. In exceedingly rare instances, a specific episode of a new original work anime can also be adapted.

character.name: Uran
character.description: Uranium is Astro Boy`s sister constructed by Dr. Ochanomizu as a gift for his birthday. Has 100,000 horsepower strengh.

character.name: Rock Holmes
character.description: In the world of show business, it is common knowledge that actors who start out playing the role of children rarely make it to the top of their profession. This is because child stars, who are loved in the role of cute children, even if they grow, are burdened with the fate of having to continue showing the same image to audiences. In the same way, in the Manga of Tezuka Osamu, loveable, law-abiding characters like Kenichi and Atom were restricted to continuously playing the same role. But Rock is different. He was not simply a virtuous character. From the time he started performing in child roles, he never believed in the image that "a bright future will be born if only justice triumphs". "The world is full of inconsistencies. The world will not weep even if the fight for justice is lost and evil triumphs. Come spring the flowers will still bloom, the sunshine will still pour down in the summer." Rock was a boy who stared these realities in the face. As might be expected from a character that got his name from Sherlock Holmes, Rock is a highly intelligent young boy. That`s why he never had to trade on his charms even as he grew up. He concealed the malicious face of the devil under his handsome visage. He built up his character as the portrait of a villain. Part of the appeal of Tezuka Osamu`s Manga lies in the fact that such warped boy stars are incorporated into the stories, and in the inclusion of elements of profundity and philosophy.

episode.title: アトム誕生の巻
The Birth of Astro Boy
Atom Tanjou no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Tenma, Director General of the Science Ministry, loses his dearest son Tobio in an accident, so he decides to create the robot Astro Boy, who looks like Tobio, using the best of the Science Ministry`s technology. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: フランケンの巻
Colosso
Franken no Maki
episode.summary: Franken, who has been classified as an inferior product at the robot factory, harbors a violent hatred for humans. As a result, humans begin to say, "We cannot trust robots," and even start to persecute the good robots. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 火星探検の巻
Expedition to Mars
Kasei Tanken no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy is appointed leader of an exploration to Mars. Lieutenant Cap, who has to work for Astro Boy, however, rises in revolt against Astro Boy because he does not like the idea of robots ordering humans around. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ゲルニカの巻
One Million Mammoth Snails
Guernica no Maki
episode.summary: Many cities fall one after another due to a huge group of monsters called "Guernica." Astro Boy fights against Guernica to save the people. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: スフィンクスの巻
The Sphinx
Sphinx no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy is captured by a gang of thieves looking for treasures hidden in a Pyramid, and he tries to destroy the beast of the god Sphinx, which has a lion`s body and the face of a beauty. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 電光人間の巻
Zero, the Invisible Robot
Denkou Ningen no Maki
episode.summary: Skunk steals the invisible robot Denko that was made of paper glass, and releases prisoners from jail. He wants to use Denko in order to build an empire of gangs... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム大使の巻
Captain Atom
Atom-taishi no Maki
episode.summary: A swarm of aliens who look exactly like specific earthlings such as Dr. Ochanomizu and Higeoyaji immigrate to the Earth from a planet very similar to ours. However, a food shortage occurs, and humans begin to attack the aliens with cell-reducing fluid. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 幽霊製造機の巻
The Spirit Machine
Yuurei Seizouki no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ochanomizu is taken away to the country Gorgonia, where he finds the Dictator Hillar`s plot to conquer the world with a cloning machine, which is also a ghost-manufacturing machine that can make endless copies of any objects. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ブラックルックスの巻
The Deep Freeze
Black Looks no Maki
episode.summary: A group called Black Looks sets out to exterminate robots, and they attack in succession. Astro Boy begins to fight against them. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: イワンの馬鹿の巻
Strange Voyage
Ivan no Baka no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy lands on an unknown planet, where he finds the tomb of a female leader of an expedition and a stupid but faithful robot Ivan that guards the tomb. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: タイムマシンの巻
Time Machine
Time Machine no Maki
episode.summary: A boy who comes from the future is looking for his father, who has gone to capture ancient creatures and has never come back. So Astro Boy and the boy depart for the ancient world in search of the boy`s father. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 十字架島の巻
Cross Island
Juujika-tou no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Serizawa is an escaped convict trying to steal the underground resources of Cross Island by using the robot Puke that can transform itself into anything. He is planning to run away on a rocket. Astro Boy follows the man to Cross Island. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: キリストの眼の巻
The Eyes of Christ
Christ no Me no Maki
episode.summary: A priest has marked one of the eyes of Jesus in the church before he dies. This seems to be a clue to the identity of a gang that had broken into the church. Now the same gang starts to go after Higeoyaji, who has discovered the gang`s secret. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 人工太陽の巻
The Artificial Sun
Jinkou Taiyou no Maki
episode.summary: Suddenly an artificial sun appears. It is a threat to the world from the gang Kaito Kinsankaku. Astro Boy sets out to destroy the gang, together with detective Sherlock Homespan. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 植物人間の巻
Grass Boy
Shokubutsu Ningen no Maki
episode.summary: A flying disk from Planet Alfee is busily collecting water from the Earth. Astro Boy learns that they are collecting water for their hometown because it suffers a water shortage. Planet Alfee, however, had already been ruined... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 白い惑星号の巻
Silver Comet
Shiroi Wakusei Gou no Maki
episode.summary: The vehicle "White Planet" participates in the Round-the-world Grand Prix, but a gang breaks it to prevent it from winning. So Dr. Ochanomizu offers to load White Planet with Astro Boy`s artificial intelligence. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボットランドの巻
Hullabaloo Land
Robot Land no Maki
episode.summary: "Robot Land" is a theme park where robots dressed as the main characters of children`s books entertain children. In its underground factory, however, slave robots are forced to make weapons. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ガデムの巻
Gangor, the Monster
Gadem no Maki
episode.summary: A gang tries to smuggle the robot Gadem, which begins to act violently in a passenger boat. Then Astro Boy, who happens to be on the boat, tries to stop them. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム対魔神の巻
The Cosmic Giant
Atom tai Majin no Maki
episode.summary: The robot Garon, who re-models planets, is transported to Earth by mistake, and humans consider attacking it with nuclear weapons. Astro Boy, however, takes to other means to face Garon. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 気体人間の巻
Toxor, the Mist Man
Kitai Ningen no Maki
episode.summary: A "gas man" enters into Dr. Ishizu`s body in space, and comes back to the Earth. Then a number of gasmen enter into human bodies, and begin to act violently. Astro Boy challenges these invisible cosmic creatures to a fight. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 人工衛星R-45の巻
Satellite R-45
Jinkoueisei R-45 no Maki
episode.summary: A member of the cosmic patrol is struggling against gangs. When Astro Boy comes to help him, however, he says that he does not need any help from a robot. He does not know that he is also a robot. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 海蛇島の巻
Sea Serpent Isle
Umihebi-tou no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy heads for Sea Serpent Island to rescue the girl Anna, who has been captured, but he is also caught. Moreover, Astro Boy`s body begins to rust because the island is rich in salt... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ミュータントの巻
The Deadly Flies
Mutant no Maki
episode.summary: A mysterious murder case occurs. Astro Boy happens to be on the scene and is arrested as a suspect. The real culprit, however, is a mutant created by X party, which plans to conquer the world. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 海底王国の巻
Kingdom of the Sea
Kaitei Oukoku no Maki
episode.summary: Why don`t we destroy humans and build a kingdom only of robots? Disposable bomb robots for a submarine kingdom make this suggestion to Astro Boy. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地底戦車の巻
The Deep-underground Tank
Chitei Sensha no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Jordan runs away from a president who plans to conquer the world. Astro Boy gets on a deep-underground tank with him to fight against the president. But they lose control of the tank and it begins to head toward a volcano. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトラスの巻
Don Tay`s Infernal Machine
Atlas no Maki
episode.summary: Atlas has the same kind of power as Astro Boy, but he has an evil heart. For Astro Boy, the fight with Atlas means fighting with his own dark side. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: パール星の巻
Pearl People
Pearl-sei no Maki
episode.summary: To build a submarine dam, bombs for construction work are set up in a place where inhabitants of Planet Pearl have been living secretly. When Astro Boy finds that out, he plays a major part in rescuing their community under the sea. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: マッドマシンの巻
The Wacky Machine
Mad Machine no Maki
episode.summary: Mad Machine causes all machines to go wrong and malfunction. The machine goes out of control, and the city is thrown into chaos. Because Astro Boy is also a machine, he begins to malfunction... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 想い出の日の巻
Memory Day
Omoide no Hi no Maki
episode.summary: When Astro Boy gets inside the unfinished time machine in Jiro`s room, he hears the voice of Jiro, who is supposed to be dead. Jiro might have traveled to another time and perhaps is having trouble coming back. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ZZZ総統の巻
Secret Agent 3-Z
ZZZ Soutou no Maki
episode.summary: The President of ZZZ Gang is so eager to conquer the world that he even kills his twin brother. So Astro Boy stands up to destroy his ambition. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 黒い宇宙線の巻
Mysterious Cosmic Rays
Kuroi Uchuusen no Maki
episode.summary: A monster appears in the city, and it turns out to be Dr. Dorian, who has been exiled to Mars. He turns into a monster because he cannot get cosmic X rays on the Earth. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ホットドッグ兵団の巻
Hot Dog Corps
Hot Dog Heidan no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ponkotsu implants dogs with robot brains. Then the dogs form the "Hot Dog Army" to take on the humans. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 二人の魔術師の巻
The Three Magicians
Futari no Majutsushi no Maki
episode.summary: A man takes on the police with a robot thief. Then a gifted magician is suspected of theft, so he and Astro Boy go against the robot thief together. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 人間牧場の巻
Planet X
Ningen Bokujou no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy sets out on a rocket to rescue people who have been kidnapped for use as livestock on a planet that looks like the Earth. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: プイプイ教の巻
The Elixir of Life
Pui Pui Kyou no Maki
episode.summary: The religious group "Pui Pui" is looking for a wonder drug that will give them immortality. Then Dr. Tatsuji, who has succeeded in developing such a drug, is taken away by the religious group. So Astro Boy fights them to ensure the peaceful use of the drug. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ウランちゃんの巻
The Strange Birthday Present
Uran-chan no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ochanomizu gives Astro Boy a younger sister as a birthday present. This younger sister Uran is a very cute girl, but she is such a tomboy that Astro Boy is kept terribly busy settling the confusion she causes. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 狂った小惑星の巻
The Asteroid Menace
Kurutta Shouwakusei no Maki
episode.summary: The small planet Mezusa goes out of its orbit and heads straight to the Earth. To save the Earth from a collision with the planet, Astro Boy heads for the planet with a convict who is a bomb professional. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 赤い猫の巻
The Mysterious Cat
Akai Neko no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Shisoku despairs of human beings that continue the ongoing destruction of nature, and makes animals attack cities in his machine that hypnotizes with ultra short waves. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ネオ・シーザーの巻
The Abominable Snowman
Neo Caesar no Maki
episode.summary: A man named Caesar dreams of rebuilding the Roman Empire with robots under his control. However, he is destined to follow the same path that as that of Julius Caesar. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: X爆弾の巻
Deadline to Danger
X Bakudan no Maki
episode.summary: X Bomb, which is capable of turning any substance to water, drops into the Pacific Ocean. There are fifty hours left till the explosion. Astro Boy goes to recollect it, but learns that Uran, who has followed him, has been swallowed along with the bomb by a whale. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 黄色い馬の巻
The Yellow Horse
Kiiroi Uma no Maki
episode.summary: Astro Boy gets into a satellite owned by the drug smuggling organization "Yellow Horse." There, the members of the organization are secretly creating missiles for use in war. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: デッドクロス殿下の巻
Ditto
Dead Cross Denka no Maki
episode.summary: The robot president Rag is the target of an assassin. Then Astro Boy finds out that the culprit is Dead Cross, Rag`s creator. He had created Rag to run in the presidential election, but when Rag gets elected, he begins to hold a grudge against Rag. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: エジプト陰謀団の巻
Cleopatra`s Heart
Egypt Inboudan no Maki
episode.summary: Uran is kidnapped. She is made a hostage in an operation to steal Cleopatra`s necklace from Astro Boy. The gang of conspirators believes that whoever possesses the necklace can build the greatest empire in the world. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: クレオパトラの首飾りの巻
Return of Cleopatra
Cleopatra no Kubikazari no Maki
episode.summary: The gang of conspirators obtains the coveted necklace, and at last sets about conquering the world. However, Astro Boy stands in the way of their boss, Cleopatra. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット宇宙艇の巻
The Phantom Space Ship
Robot Uchuutei no Maki
episode.summary: The robot spaceship "Lever Robot" is stolen. Astro Boy is sent to retrieve it, but in the process has his energy stolen. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙ガニの巻
The Gigantic Space Crab
Uchuugani no Maki
episode.summary: Ham egg exchanges a pig from the Earth for the huge crab that the alien Pork has. He is trying to make a lot of money by making a show of the creature in a circus... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 天馬族の巻
The Great Space Horse
Tenmazoku no Maki
episode.summary: Nuu, member of the Tenma Tribe, a rarely seen race of people, comes from the depths of the mountains of Mongolia. People rush to the city just to try and see Nuu, throwing the city into a big chaos. Moreover, a gang plots behind the scenes to capture Nuu. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 透明巨人の巻
3D Tee Vee
Toumei Kyojin no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Hanabusa develops an electrical transmitter for substances. No sooner does he get into the machine for testing than his rival scientist breaks the machine, which makes Dr. Hanabusa an invisible man. Astro Boy tries to save the doctor. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム西部へ行くの巻
Westward, Ha!
Atom Seibu e Iku no Maki
episode.summary: To find Hekku, who had departed to the west in the past but has not returned yet, Astro Boy and Higeoyaji also travel back in time. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 子象プーラの巻
Jimbo the Great
Kozou Pura no Maki
episode.summary: The robot elephant Zora malfunctions and runs away into the jungle. There, Astro Boy is taking care of a little elephant Pura that has gotten separated from its fellows. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 雪ライオンの巻
The Snow Lion
Yuki Lion no Maki
episode.summary: An old man who comes from Planet Regel to the Earth brings a snow lion with him. Then, aliens from Planet Regel start to spray cosmic snow that sucks up all energy... Astro Boy takes off for space to save the Earth, where cities have stopped functioning. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: さようなら1963年の巻
Goodbye 1963
Sayounara 1963-nen no Maki
episode.summary: It is New Year`s Eve, 1963. Uran finds a picture while cleaning the house. With the picture as a clue, Astro Boy and Dr. Ochanomizu begin to piece together the past. This episode is a special edition that includes an introduction of "The making of the film of Astro Boy." Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アルプスの決闘の巻
Duel on the Alps
Alps no Kettou no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Tenma, who once dumped his "child" Astro Boy, wants him back and asks the gang Skunk for help. Skunk`s group, the "Illusionary Club," succeeds in abducting Astro Boy and his family... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 若返りガスの巻
Rejuvenating Gas
Wakagaeri Gas no Maki
episode.summary: The royal family of the palace satellite Yoranna gets what they are told is “rejuvenating gas" from earthlings. When it turns out to be just teargas, however, they launch an H-bomb missile toward the Earth in retaliation. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地球防衛隊の巻
The Moon Monsters
Chikyuu Bouei-tai no Maki
episode.summary: Aliens planning to collect information about the Earth abduct Dr. Ochanomizu. Atom, on a mission to rescue the doctor, visits Earth Defense Base on the moon, but the aliens destroy the base. (In color) Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット学校の巻
Astro Boy Goes to School
Robot Gakkou no Maki
episode.summary: Humans can see the beauty of things and be impressed by them. In order to learn these feelings, called “heart," Atom, Uran and Lara start attending a robot school. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 13の怪神像の巻
The Island of Mystery
13 no Kai Shinzou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu decipher ancient code of 200,000 years ago. Discovering that hidden hints in the thirteen statues of god in Western Island might lead them to the secrets of outer space, they head for the island. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 白熱人間の巻
The Super Duper Robot
Hakunetsu Ningen no Maki
episode.summary: Gaston, who has stolen a blueprint of a robot from a UFO requests the Science Ministry to build the robot exactly as shown on the blueprint, without indicating its source. The completed robot Buron turns out to be a destructive weapon, and starts to destroy everything. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙の寄生虫の巻
Space Parasites
Uchuu no Kiseichuu no Maki
episode.summary: The last of the Nazis demand the government of the Earth to turn over the planet, threatening to shower it with space parasites. When the government refuses to surrender, a group of UFOs containing space parasites come swarming toward the Earth. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 幽霊船の巻
The Haunted Ship
Yuureisen no Maki
episode.summary: Wishing to have a “heart" like a human, Atom has his body equipped with a heart that can feel fear. Soon after, a phantom ship appears over the Indian Ocean. Atom is sent to investigate it, but he is scared out of his wits. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 人工氷山の巻
The Man-Made Iceberg
Jinkou Hyouzan no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Zulu places a bomb in an artificial iceberg and tries to trigger a flood. Discovering the plot, Atom sets out to prevent the explosion, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: こうもり伯爵の巻
Vampire Vale
Koumori Hakushaku no Maki
episode.summary: Tick and Tack get lost in the depths of the Unzen Mountain, and decide to stay for a night in a deserted house inhabited by a vampire. The vampire (Dr. Pedan) tries to turn Tick into a vampire, but Atom comes to rescue them. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 勇敢な脱走者の巻
The Terrible Tidal Wave
Yuukan na Dassousha no Maki
episode.summary: A massive tidal wave breaks. Atom flies up to stop the wave, but crashes into the sea. Then an escapee robot Boggy saves the unconscious Atom. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: スペースバイキングの巻
Vikings
Space Viking no Maki
episode.summary: In order to rid the earth of space pirates, Atom destroys their mother ship. The pirates, however, are holding some hostages and demand that Atom withdraw. Atom is helpless. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 夜の勇士達の巻
The Devil Doll
Yoru no Yuushi-tachi no Maki
episode.summary: While playing in the toy section, Uran imbues some of the toys with artificial intelligence. Among these are some with evil hearts. Atom asks the good toys to help him stop the bad dolls from doing misdeeds. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 恐龍人の反乱の巻
Dinosaur Dilemma
Kyouryuujin no Hanran no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is babysitting in an ancient amusement park when a dragon flies off with a small child in front of his. Then the dinosaurs demand food for ransom. So Atom... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 時計塔の秘密の巻
The Clock Tower Mystery
Tokeitou no Himitsu no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Temp, who has completed his killing-beam machine, is planning to ruin the “Conference of Scientists." Discovering the plot, Atom takes on the doctor. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ラフレシアの巻
The Flower Monster
Rafflesia no Maki
episode.summary: Rafflesia, the largest flower on earth, is found to be in fact a plant man from outer space. This flower, which needs radioactivity to survive, is stronger than it looks, and even Atom is no match for it. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地球最後の日の巻
Attack from Space
Chikyuu Saigo no Hi no Maki
episode.summary: “Red Star" is heading toward the Earth. Watching Atom struggle to save the Earth from a collision, Bem, a high-powered bomb robot, decides that the only way to save the Earth and Atom is to blow himself up. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙の漂流7日間の巻
Shipwreck in Space
Uchuu no Hyouryuu Nanokakan no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is chasing gangs who have run away by rocket. Then he finds them in a shelter station being attacked by aliens. He helps the gangs, but finds himself drifting in space with them after the station is destroyed. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ビッグタイタンの巻
Big Titan
Big Titan no Maki
episode.summary: The daughter of Dr. Putt, a descendant of the Mohican tribe, is kidnapped. When he sees Uran, who is a look-alike of his daughter, he takes Atom and his fellows for the kidnappers. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地球探検の巻
Mission to the Middle of the World
Chikyuu Tanken no Maki
episode.summary: It is thought that a highly advanced civilization might exist underground. To test this hypothesis, Atom and Uran set out on an underground expedition. There they get attacked by underground men. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 空とぶ町の巻
Inca Gold Fever
Soratobu Machi no Maki
episode.summary: In order to collect the hidden treasures of the Inca that are scattered around the world, the old man Kapack, who has the power to move things with his mind, asks Tondale for help. Tondale, however, plans to get all the gold to himself, and starts an attack on the world with a special machine that enhances mind power. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: モンスターマシーンの巻
The Monster Machine
Monster Machine no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Morse succeeds in corresponding with Planet Paranoia, which is more civilized than the Earth. With the help of Atom, the doctor assembles a mysterious box following the instructions on a blueprint sent from the planet, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ケープタウンの子守歌の巻
The Hooligan Whodunit
Cape Town no Komoriuta no Maki
episode.summary: A boy named “Looks" is deeply attached to the robot that has brought him up. He loves the robot as if it were his mother. From the day the robot is destroyed by another robot, he begins to hate all robots. Then he forms an exclusive organization called “Black Looks," and starts to oppress robots... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 50万年後の世界の巻
Funnel to the Future
50-mannengo no Sekai no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and his friends jump into the far future world by accident. There, they see the cruel Pepper tribe treating their enemy tribes as slaves. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ドクター脳の巻
Super Brain
Doctor Nou no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Kanekura kills world famous brain surgeon Dr. Ibal, making it look like an accident. Since the incident, a strange robot named Friday follows him around. In truth, Dr. Ibal`s brain waves are controlling the robot. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ヒューマノイドピルの巻
A Mighty Minute
Humanoid Pill no Maki
episode.summary: Atom meets a strange creature in the wooded outskirts of Tokyo. It is a humanoid, a product of science. The humanoid named Bill does not know whether he is a creature or a machine. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 夢みる機械の巻
The Dream Machine
Yumemiru Kikai no Maki
episode.summary: What kind of dreams do robots have? Atom participates in an experiment of a dream machine created by Dr. Poron, and becomes the first robot that dreams. In his dream, he turns into a human. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット競技大会の巻
The Robot Olympics
Robot Kyougi Taikai no Maki
episode.summary: Atom participates in the Olympic games for robots, where he finds a group of robots destroying other participants in a vicious act of sabotage designed to ensure that they win the games. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 怪鳥ガルダの巻
Dunder, Bird of Doom
Kaichou Garuda no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Raja, who believes in the Indian god of destruction Carley, creates a robot bird. Then it comes flying over Japan. The bird Garuda demands Atom as a sacrifice to Carley... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: イルカ文明の巻
Dolphins in Distress
Iruka Bunmei no Maki
episode.summary: Claiming to possess every inch of the ocean floor, Hall tries to build an autocratic submarine civilization. He starts to persecute the aboriginal Dolphin tribe. Atom stands up to preserve the peace on the ocean floor. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 狂ったベルトウェイの巻
The Mad Beltway
Kurutta Beltway no Maki
episode.summary: One of the latest means of traffic the new city boasts, the Beltway, is almost complete. However, someone tries to obstruct its construction, setting the site aflame. Atom sets off to protect the Beltway. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 時間銃の巻
The Terrible Time Gun
Jikan Juu no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Tempo is waiting for a chance to become the next director of the Science Ministry. With his time gun that can send its targets to the past, he sends the bothersome Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu to the middle Ages. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 新かぐや姫の巻
Space Princess
Shin Kaguya-hime no Maki
episode.summary: Atom exchanges messages with a star nymph, and sets out on an expedition to find the pure water the nymph needs. The star nymph is, in fact, a princess of the Planet Keios. She is trying to turn into a cocoon with pure water on a full-moon night in preparation for emergence. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 細菌部隊の巻
Mighty Microbe Army
Saikin Butai no Maki
episode.summary: The pilot of a rocket that has made an emergency landing is suffering from a strange disease. After they hear a voice from within the pilot`s body, Atom and Higeoyaji are reduced to tiny figures, and get into the body. Inside, they see bacteria-sized aliens. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ゴメスの亡霊の巻
Horrible King Horrid
Gomes no Bourei no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ochanomizu accepts a request to repair robots in the Scambo Empire. The robot he repairs, however, turns out to be the president of the Empire. The doctor`s life is in danger, as he now knows the secret. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット砦の巻
Mystery of Amless Dam
Robot Toride no Maki
episode.summary: A robot child has a fight with a human child, making the child cry. The humans become angry when they hear this, and a war breaks out between humans and robots. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ガロン逆襲の巻
Galeom from Galaxy G
Garon Gyakushuu no Maki
episode.summary: Garon, a robot Atom has sent back to space, comes back. Seeing Atom struggle hard to fend off Garon, the Earth Robot Army stand together to attack Garon. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット三銃士の巻
The Three Robotiers
Robot Sanjuushi no Maki
episode.summary: In order to save patients suffering from space disease on Mars, a serum is sent to Mars from the Earth. All the transport ships carrying the serum, however, get destroyed on their way. Atom, together with the three robot knights, goes into space to protect the last of the serum. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: コバルトの巻
Brother Jetto
Cobalt no Maki
episode.summary: There is a robot that has been dumped along with other junk during the cleaning of the warehouse in the Science Ministry. It is a prototype of Atom, made by Dr. Tenma, named Cobalt. When Cobalt wakes from sleep, he tries to go back to the Science Ministry, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アルプスの天使の巻
Angel of the Alps
Alps no Tenshi no Maki
episode.summary: The construction of a dam near the Bering Strait is hampered by difficulties. Dr. Zeman`s research is required to solve the problem. Atom goes to ask for help from the doctor who lives a secluded life in the depth of the Alps because of his hatred for civilization. Atom, however, finds the doctor being attacked by another robot that is after the research material. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 魔のパンチカードの巻
Magic Punch Card
Ma no Punch Card no Maki
episode.summary: A missile base is completely controlled by computer. Now, the computer is out of control, setting the stage for nuclear attack. In fact, this is a means of personal revenge by Dr. Yakoref, who has lost the competition for the design of the base. Atom starts to disassemble the computer, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボットヒューチャーの巻
The Great Rocket Robbery
Robot Future no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Akuta, who is after the gold ingot on Mars, controls a robot called “Future." The robot, however, becomes humble after hearing out Atom. Then Atom and Future pursue the doctor, who has run away with the gold ingot. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙の対決の巻
Contest in Space
Uchuu no Taiketsu no Maki
episode.summary: Planet Hyper is the most civilized planet in the galactic system. Now it chooses a pair of a human and a robot each from both the Earth and Planet War to have them fight against each other, and decides to destroy the loser`s planet. Atom and Ponkotsu Tetsu, the safebreaker, are chosen to represent the Earth. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ゼオの遺産の巻
Gift of Zeo
Zeo no Isan no Maki
episode.summary: A big robot is excavated from the construction site of a tunnel. It turns out to be a time capsule that was created to pass down information on a super ancient civilization of a million years ago to posterity. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 小さなコロンブスの巻
A Deep, Deep Secret
Chiisana Columbus no Maki
episode.summary: Colon-bu-bu, the explorer of the underground state of Chombo, heads for the ground hoping to see a new world. Then he meets Cobalt, and takes him underground as prisoner. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボットハウスの巻
The Wonderful Christmas Present
Robot House no Maki
episode.summary: On Christmas night, Dr. Ochanomizu opens the will of his scientist friend who died 10 years before. It says that he has left an invention in Bururu Mountain. Atom and his friends happen to be on the mountain, and encounter a boy called Akio who lives alone there. They become friends, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地図にない世界の巻
Uncharted World
Chizu ni Nai Sekai no Maki
episode.summary: The visiting Prince Dorian of the Camellia Kingdom disappears. Atom goes searching for him using the latest four-dimensional detection device, and finds the prince wandering in another world. That world is inhabited by people who have been spirited away from various time periods. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 魔境の女王の巻
Jungle Mystery
Makyou no Joou no Maki
episode.summary: Uran is going to be in a movie. Her role is Tarzan. When she goes on location to the jungle, however, a mysterious woman takes her away. The woman is planning to make Uran, who is dressed as a boy, a prince of the demon`s place-a place where nobody grows old. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙への階段の巻
The Terrible Spaceman
Uchuu e no Kaidan no Maki
episode.summary: Humans are drawn toward a flight of stairs that suddenly appear one day, and they start to walk toward a spaceship hidden among the clouds. When there are no humans left on earth, the robots start to talk about taking over the planet. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 悪魔の風船の巻
The Devil`s Balloon
Akuma no Fusen no Maki
episode.summary: A balloon in the shape of Atom appears over the city. Children love Atom so much that they begin to run after the balloon and disappear. Because such incidents frequently occur, Atom comes to be regarded as a fearful enemy of children. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地球最大の冒険の巻
The Greatest Adventure on Earth
Chikyuu Saidai no Bouken no Maki no Maki
episode.summary: As the temperature of the Earth rises due to the influence of a sunspot, all humans evacuate the Earth and head for space. Only robots are supposed to remain on the Earth, but there is one villain left, and he is trying to seize this chance to conquer the planet. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ムーンチャンピオンの巻
The Moon Champion
Moon Champion no Maki
episode.summary: Shooting, fencing, an obstacle race, and wrestling: Atom wins easily in these four games, advancing to the final league of the Moon Champion. However, war robot Goram, controlled by Ham Egg, starts to get in Atom`s way. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: サターンマンの巻
Super Human Beings
Saturn Man no Maki
episode.summary: hree scientists gain supernatural power on the surface of the moon. Then Dr. Arden- who has a grudge against Dr. Ochanomizu-stages an attack against him. In order to protect Dr. Ochanomizu, Atom fights fiercely against the scientists who have supernatural power. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 実験ロボットの巻
The Experimental Robot
Jikken Robot no Maki
episode.summary: “Please help me," a robot pleads as runs into the house of Dr. Ochanomizu. He tells the doctor that in a country called Yumani, the science minister Mooshy is demolishing robots in an experiment. So Dr. Ochanomizu and Atom travel to the country, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ヘラルド兄弟の巻
The Herald Brothers
Herald Kyoudai no Maki
episode.summary: The Herald brothers are trying to defeat every robot in the world. Dr. Herald, disguised as a robot, is controlling them. Then he even captures Atom. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙ぐもの巻
The Space Spider
Uchuugumo no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu investigate a UFO. Judging the empty disk dangerous, they stage an attack on it with a missile. Then a huge spider appears from the same type of disk that has landed on earth, and starts attacking humans. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: メトロモンスターの巻
Metro Monster
Metro Monster no Maki
episode.summary: A huge slug appears in a subway station yard, and begins to eat trains. Atom sets out to destroy it, but the slug proves to be a much tougher enemy as it appears in unexpected places. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 空中スクリーンの巻
Mid-Air Screen
Kuuchuu Screen no Maki
episode.summary: A machine for projecting pictures in the air has recently been invented. Then the owner of a theater steals it, and starts to take away energy from machines and robots in order to get enough energy for screening. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 海底大運河の巻
The Great Submarine Canal
Kaitei Daiunga no Maki
episode.summary: Strange incidents start occurring, such as an event where a vessel that had disappeared in the Japan Sea turns up in the Pacific Ocean. Dr. Ochanomizu thinks that there could be a submarine canal right beneath Japan. So Atom goes in search of the canal, and encounters subterranean people on the ocean floor. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 永遠のクッチャーの巻
Kutcher Forever
Eien no Kutcher no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Kutcher, inventor of artificial intelligence, is dead. People become crazy trying to uncover his immense legacy. In the middle of this, Atom receives a message from the doctor who is supposed to be dead. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: タイム戦争の巻
Time War
Time Sensou no Maki
episode.summary: People who have white blood come from the future with Robot Jijiru following them. Blood transfusion are needed to save them. When Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu fly to the future, they discover a post- nuclear war-world. Man has become extinct, and there is a continuous war between artificial men and robots. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 史上最大のロボットの巻 (後篇)
The Biggest Robot on Earth (Part 2)
Shijou Saidai no Robot no Maki (Kouhen)
episode.summary: The strongest of all robots, Pluto, has electromagnetic horns that can destroy anything. Pluto destroys the world`s most powerful robots one by one. Depicted here is Atom`s hard struggle to challenge this mighty enemy. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 赤い木馬の巻
The Red Merry-Go-Round
Akai Mokuba no Maki
episode.summary: Uran is on a merry-go-round in an amusement park when she disappears. The merry-go-round turns out to be an electrical transmitter for sending certain substances that was made by Dr. Umazuki, who lost his daughter and horse ten years before. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: インカ帝国の宝の巻
Treasures of the Inca Empire
Inca Teikoku no Takara no Maki
episode.summary: A passenger plane flying over the Amazon crashes. Atom, who is on board, saves a girl called Milly who has a map showing the places where treasures of the Inca Empire are hidden. But a group of men looking for the treasures are after her. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボットグラビーの巻
Robot Grabby
Robot Grabby no Maki
episode.summary: A robot named Grabby is a 1/2 G fighter robot that has run away from a country called Nickrasia. Atom tries to help Grabby, who is too gentle to live as a weapon. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 地球解放の巻
Mystery of the Metal Men
Chikyuu Kaihou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is involved in an explosion during the construction of a dam. The impact sends him into a parallel world where Tobio, the son of Dr. Tenma, never died in an accident that killed him in our world. In other words, it is a world where Atom has not been born. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボイドの巻
Roboids
Roboid no Maki
episode.summary: An army of Roboids that look like robots but are extremely close to creatures come to the Earth from the outer space. Dr. Ochanomizu sends all the robots on earth to fight off the Roboid Army, but the robots are destroyed one after another by the mighty foes. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 未来からの報告の巻
Report from the Future
Mirai kara no Houkoku no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Muder reports, “Tomorrow, robots will start a rebellion" when he comes back from a time machine trip to the next day. Hearing this, humans start a riot, shouting that the robots should be destroyed now. The scared robots run into a fortress. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 不死鳥の巻
Phoenix Bird
Fushichou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom finds a big egg in a cave on a little island where he is playing with Uran. He asks Dr. Ochanomizu to identify the egg, but they are unsuccessful. So Atom goes back to the island, where he encounters a strange bird that lives there. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 笑わぬバック国の巻
Dangerous Mission
Warawanu Back-koku no Maki
episode.summary: A country called “Back" suddenly withdraws from the World Peace Union, and announces to its people a ban on invention and laughter. Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu visit the country to find out what is behind this closed-door dictatorial policy. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 黄金のフルートの巻
The Golden Flute
Ougon no Flute no Maki
episode.summary: The flute expresses the player`s feelings through its tunes. Ryuryu, who possesses the flute, comes to Japan in search of her beloved grandfather, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 別世界への道の巻
Road to Another World
Bessekai e no Michi no Maki
episode.summary: A flaming car disappears as if being swallowed up in another dimension, leaving behind a silver coin that was used in the ancient civilization of the Mu continent. Atom tries to solve the mystery of Mu. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 青騎士 (後編)
The Blue Knight (Part 2)
Ao Kishi (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Count Burg hates serial killer robot Blue Knight so much that he even destroys innocent robots. Atom is caught in the middle of the hatred between robots and humans. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット犬バッキーの巻
The Robot-Dog Backy
Robot Inu Backy no Maki
episode.summary: Atom goes to see a robot-dog contest with Dr. Ochanomizu. There, Atom becomes aware of poor stray robot-dogs left behind in the shadow of more beautiful, more accomplished robot-dogs. He feels sorry for the forgotten dogs. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 小さいクーリーの巻
Little Cooley
Chiisai Cooley no Maki
episode.summary: A sister-robot and her younger brother-robot run away from a space station and head for the Earth. The two robots are equipped with heat resistant devices that enable them to work near the sun. When their bodies touch each other, the surrounding temperature rapidly drops. If they come to the Earth, everything will freeze... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ばかでかいロボットの巻
The Gigantic Robot
Bakadekai Robot no Maki
episode.summary: In a country called Herenia, the national budget is all used to make the world`s largest robot Gorem. The robot, however, turns violent because its artificial intelligence is imperfect. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 10年目の復讐の巻
Revenge After Ten Years
10-nenme no Fukushuu no Maki
episode.summary: The ordinary robot Riboryu suddenly turns violent and lets Dr. Marus and his accomplices escape from jail. Riboryu has been preprogrammed to save Dr. Marus after ten years. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット市長の巻
Robot Mayor
Robot Shichou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and his friends visit a city governed by a robot mayor. The artificial intelligence of the popular mayor, however, turns out to be malfunctioning. When Atom realizes this, he thinks the mayor should not continue his work any more, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ジュエルの魔像の巻
The Jewel-Eating Monster
Jewel no Mazou no Maki
episode.summary: Since the science ministries of the world refuse to stop producing war weapons, Dr. Jugemu starts to destroy the ministries with a monster figure that produces tremendous power when it consumes jewels. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット大戦争の巻 (前篇)
Robot Wars (Part 1)
Robot Daisensou no Maki (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Super artificial intelligence robot Logos threatens to melt the ice on the South Pole and to sink the world into the ocean unless the world surrenders. In response to this threat, Atom and his friends go off to destroy Logos. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: カンヅメ狂騒曲の巻
The Can Capriccio
Kanzume Kyousoukyoku no Maki
episode.summary: A can with a parachute falls from the sky on Atom`s house on New Year`s Day. He tries hard to open it without success. Meanwhile, a can opener falls from the sky in a different place... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 撮影所騒動の巻
Confusion at the Shooting Studio
Satsueijo Soudou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and Uran go to see the shooting of a film. There, they see robots that look exactly like themselves, and take part in the filming after secretly changing places. In the shooting studio, however, stunt robots are treated as harshly as if they were objects. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム深海を行くの巻
Atom in the Deep Sea
Atom Shinkai o Iku no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ochanomizu assigns Atom a new mission that requires him to find an H-bomb plane from the deep waters and to defuse it. Then Atom`s mother becomes angry because he is always summoned for dangerous missions. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 怪獣マントラーの巻
The Monster Mantler
Kaijuu Mantler no Maki
episode.summary: A big earthquake wipes out the city. Atom is buried under a collapsed building, but still manages to fight a huge monster that has appeared in the city. Unfortunately Atom has lost his seven powers during the earthquake. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 失われた友情の巻
Lost Friendship
Ushinawareta Yuujou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom saves Robot Muller from villains, and a friendship develops between them. Muller plays happily with Atom and Uran, but in fact he is a robot for terrorist use, made to destroy a nuclear power plant. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 長い1日の巻
A Long Day
Nagai Ichinichi no Maki
episode.summary: Abnormal weather suddenly hits the Earth. After an investigation, it becomes clear that the problem has been caused by Earth`s orbit having gone astray. Then Atom realizes that behind this are evil aliens trying to destroy the Earth. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ルイ王子の巻
Prince Louis
Louis-ouji no Maki
episode.summary: The mother of Prince Louis steals Shadow II, a new-style robot designed for spying. She is planning to replace her son`s body with the latest robot. She does not know that ShadowIIis loaded with a time bomb... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 悪魔と天使の巻
Devil and Angel
Akuma to Tenshi no Maki
episode.summary: Gifted botanist Leaf has created the plant people Freru and Zaboa. Freru is fair like an angel, while Zaboa is an evil monster. When Zaboa becomes violent in the city, Atom and Freru set out to stop Zaboa. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: おばけは夜来るの巻
Monsters Come Out at Night
Obake wa Yoru Kuru no Maki
episode.summary: Due to trouble with their rocket, Atom and other passengers are forced to land on an unknown small planet. On the planet lives a huge monster that eats plants that grow during the night. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 狂ったコバルトの巻
Demented Cobalt
Kurutta Cobalt no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is asked to cooperate in defeating the dictator of Planet Batra, and he heads for the planet. The dictator Gammer, however, lures Cobalt out and turns him to a robot that will never disobey him. Now Atom has to fight against his own brother. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 史上最大のロボットの巻 (前篇)
The Biggest Robot on Earth (Part 1)
Shijou Saidai no Robot no Maki (Zenpen)
episode.summary: The strongest of all robots, Pluto, has electromagnetic horns that can destroy anything. Pluto destroys the world`s most powerful robots one by one. Depicted here is Atom`s hard struggle to challenge this mighty enemy. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 細菌をさがせの巻
Find the Bacteria
Saikin o Sagase no Maki
episode.summary: A petri dish containing the bacteria of a dreadful infectious disease is lost by a simple mistake. In order to protect humans from the danger of biohazard, Atom flies off to the depths of the Himalayas following the trail of the bacteria. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ミーニャの星の巻
Minya`s Star
Minya no Hoshi no Maki
episode.summary: There is a diary of a female soldier who never had the chance to return to Earth after her emergency landing on an ice planet. Now Atom, who is riding on a sightseeing rocket, is forced to land on the same planet, and finds the diary. Then humans begin to quarrel shamefully over the two diamonds mentioned in the diary. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 機関車行進曲の巻
The Locomotive March
Kikansha Koushinkyoku no Maki
episode.summary: Children love March, an atomic-powered locomotive. Getting jealous of its popularity, Gold challenges March with another locomotive called “Horsepower." The match starts based on a rule that the loser has to be disassembled. Gold obstructs March by various means. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: おきみやげの巻
Double Trouble
Okimiyage no Maki
episode.summary: An alien who comes to the Earth as an ambassador of friendship leaves a present for Dr. Ochanomizu. It is a blueprint of a highly efficient robot. When he assembles it, it turns out to be a robot that can offer the best of services to humans. Dr. Ochanomizu is pleased, envisioning a more comfortable life for humans, however... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: メドッサの館
Medussa`s Mansion
Medossa no Yakata
episode.summary: A doctor studying the mysteries of eternal youth has built Medussa`s mansion. Atom and his friends visit the mansion and find Medussa`s box, which contains the secret of eternal youth. When they open it, they find a young man named Siegfried lying inside. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 火星の嵐の巻
The Storm on Mars
Kasei no Arashi no Maki
episode.summary: Strange incidents occur frequently at the construction site of a base on Mars. Robots are also being demolished one after another. When Atom and his friends travel there to investigate, a gigantic army of ants attacks them. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: タイムハンターの巻
Time Hunter
Time Hunter no Maki
episode.summary: Remake of episode #11. Story ideas and footage combined from episodes #11 and 68. This is not a recap episode and mixes the recycled footage with new material.

episode.title: メソタミアの奇蹟
Miracle of Mesotamia
Mesotamia no Kiseki
episode.summary: Atom and his friends set out on an adventure to look for the mystery capital Mesotamia. When they are hit by a sandstorm, they find a hole up in the sky that they think could lead them to the capital. It seems likely that Mesotamia is a civilization created by aliens who came to the earth 2000 years ago. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ジャガー警部の巻
Inspector Jaguar
Jaguar-keibu no Maki
episode.summary: Police inspector Jaguar is the only robot that is allowed to arrest humans. A group of people, however, takes this as an insult and set a trap for the inspector. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: チータン夜の冒険の巻
Chi-tan`s Nighttime Adventure
Chii-tan Yoru no Bouken no Maki
episode.summary: Uran secretly takes the baby robot Chi-tan to a robot hospital to make it speak. A robot machine, however, remodels Chi-tan at its discretion. Chi-tan becomes huge, and turns violent in the city. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: キャンデー作戦の巻
Operation Candy
Candy Sakusen no Maki
episode.summary: Atom`s friend Carl immigrates to Brazil, where he gets eaten by a dreadful monster. Carl`s father sends Atom some articles left by his son, but the monster`s egg is mixed among those articles. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 青騎士 (前編)
The Blue Knight (Part 1)
Ao Kishi (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Count Burg hates serial killer robot Blue Knight so much that he even destroys innocent robots. Atom is caught in the middle of the hatred between robots and humans. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: サムソンの髪の毛の巻
Samson`s Hair
Samson no Kami no Ke no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Ochanomizu succeeds in developing the robot Samson, who is activated by solar power. Samson, however, malfunctions and becomes violent when exposed to moonlight. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム将軍の巻
General Astro
Atom-shougun no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is shot by a maser gun that ruins artificial intelligence. He loses all his memory, and is shot away into space. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボッティの巻
Robotty
Robotty no Maki
episode.summary: Robotty is a robot of a size smaller than a tiny bean. He asks Dr. Ochanomizu to make a robot-friend for him because he feels lonely all by himself. So Dr. Ochanomizu makes a robot of the same size for him. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙から来た少年の巻
The Mighty Mite from Ursa Minor
Uchuu kara Kita Shounen no Maki
episode.summary: Ham Egg sees a UFO in the woods that seems to have made an emergency landing, and finds an alien child. He notices the child`s super strength, and plans to win the child fame as a wrestler. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 王様とアトムの巻
The King and Atom
Ou-sama to Atom no Maki
episode.summary: Puka-Puka Island is a southern island. In its animal kingdom, however, is a white bear that cannot exist on a southern island. Atom and his friends head for Puka-Puka Island to find out why the bear is there, but an unseen enemy obstructs their way and makes it impossible for them to approach the island. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アトム対アトムの巻
Atom vs. Atom
Atom Tai Atom no Maki
episode.summary: A fake Atom, equipped with 200,000 horsepower, appears. This robot has been created to beat Atom by gangs around the world who have always been beaten by him. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット大戦争の巻 (後篇)
Robot Wars (Part 2)
Robot Daisensou no Maki (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Super artificial intelligence robot Logos threatens to melt the ice on the South Pole and to sink the world into the ocean unless the world surrenders. In response to this threat, Atom and his friends go off to destroy Logos. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 赤ん坊騒動の巻
A Great Fuss Over Babies
Akanbou Soudou no Maki
episode.summary: The king and queen of Family Kingdom are distressed at not being able to have a baby. So they decide to adopt a baby robot that wins a contest. Dr. Ochanomizu also participates in the contest with his robot, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 水星探検の巻
Menace from Mercury
Suisei Tanken no Maki
episode.summary: Atom is investigating a super thermal bomb that has fallen on earth. Then he heads for Mercury to find its launching site. On his way, however, Atom loses his sight in an accident, and gets involved in a power struggle with aliens on Mercury. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: おどりあがった島の巻
The Island That Jumped Up
Odori Agatta Shima no Maki
episode.summary: Newsta Island, which had suddenly appeared, is now attracting a good number of tourists as a resort. When Atom and his friends visit the island, a big earthquake occurs. Then Atom realizes that the island, in fact, is a UFO. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 風船がいっぱいの巻
Plenty of Balloons
Fuusen ga Ippai no Maki
episode.summary: Uncle Poi, who works in a toy factory, is making balloons with hydrogen gas for children. When the machine goes out of order, numerous balloons fly up in the sky. If they are left alone, the balloons may explode violently. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 脱出作戦の巻
Operation Escape
Dasshutsu Sakusen no Maki
episode.summary: Dr. Elite, who has succeeded in developing a high-speed rocket engine, is taken away with his daughter to a country called Dark. When Atom receives an SOS message through a carrier pigeon, he sets out to bring them back from Dark. However, the doctor is scared of flying, so they have to escape by other means. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 二人の王女の巻
Two Princesses
Futari no Oujo no Maki
episode.summary: Two princesses are fighting over sovereignty in a certain country. The princess of the northern castle asks Atom for his cooperation, thus involving him in their dispute. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ジプシーの星の巻
Gypsy`s Star
Gypsy no Hoshi no Maki
episode.summary: A robot planet Kipia has drifted into space, and now it is approaching the Earth. When Atom sets out to investigate the planet, he finds that the Kipia people want to make friends with earthlings. Then, in pursuit of Kipia appears the robot planet Garoa, the destroyer of civilization. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: アフリカの星の巻
Star of Africa
Africa no Hoshi no Maki
episode.summary: Due to trouble with their plane, Atom and Uran find themselves wandering in Africa. Then they find a cross that emits a mysterious voice. The cross has the power to become the god of robots when fitted with artificial intelligence. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ベーリーの冒険の巻
Baily`s Adventure
Baily no Bouken no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and Uran visit the Robot Museum. There, Atom finds an empty showcase labeled “Baily." As the name sounds familiar to Atom, he sets out to investigate it and finds that Baily is an important benefactor to him. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: バードストリート物語の巻
Bird Street Story
Bird Street Monogatari no Maki
episode.summary: Bird Street, is a preserved 20th century-street where robot boys and human boys confront each other in endless petty quarrels. A robot boys ask Atom to join them, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 逃げだした大金庫の巻
The Big Runaway Safe
Nigedashita Daikinko no Maki
episode.summary: The machines in the Mint Bureau experience accumulated stress due to overwork. So they are given hands and legs so that they can rest for a day. Once the machines have known the freedom and joy of moving around, they begin to run away from work. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボット爆弾の巻
The Robot Bombs
Robot Bakudan no Maki
episode.summary: Robot Bomb Wide wants to be useful to humans. So takes to attacking Atom, mistaking him for a bad robot. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 空とぶレンズの巻
Planet 13
Soratobu Lens no Maki
episode.summary: Planet M, shaped like a convex lens, is approaching the Earth. It reflects solar light toward the Earth, turning its surface into an incandescent hell. Humans, however, cannot cooperate in tackling this global issue because they all motivated by their own greed. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 宇宙から来たニッポン人の巻
Japanese People from Space
Uchuu kara Kita Nipponjin no Maki
episode.summary: 58 million aliens that look exactly like Japanese people immigrate to Japan, causing a serious food shortage. An alien scientist Dohyar plans to take over Japan by making Japanese people small with cell-reducing fluid. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 未来人の贈り物の巻
Gift from the Future
Miraijin no Okurimono no Maki
episode.summary: People on a time machine from the future leave something behind on earth. It turns out to be a dinosaur that existed in ancient times on Earth. Atom and Uran love the dinosaur and keep it as a pet, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロビオとロビエットの巻
Robio and Robiet
Robio to Robiet no Maki
episode.summary: The Ijio family and the Yani family have been on bad terms for generations. The robots made by the doctors in each family also hate each other. Between these enemy families, however, a fragile love begins to grow, and... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: マグネットちゃんの巻
Miss Magnet
Magnet-chan no Maki
episode.summary: Miss Magnet produces strong magnetic force when she laughs. One day a group of gangs abduct Dr. Tera, the one who created her. They are planning to rob a bank using Miss Magnet`s power. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 1人ぼっちのアトム
Lonely Atom
Hitoribocchi no Atom
episode.summary: Robot Pulse hypnotizes Dr. Ochanomizu to develop Lucky Machine, a machine that controls the human brain. Then people manipulated by its hypnotizing radio wave start to ignore Atom, leaving him all alone. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ロボットポリマーの巻
Robot Polymer
Robot Polymer no Maki
episode.summary: Claiming to be the strongest robot in the world, the huge conceited robot Polymer makes a raid on Atom`s house. He tries to show that he is the strongest of all by defeating Atom, but... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: おかしな道づれの巻
Funny Companion
Okashina Michizure no Maki
episode.summary: There is a pair of handcuffs that are impossible to take off from a villain`s wrists unless he mends his ways. Atom gets handcuffed with a thief by accident, and has to go to jail with him because he cannot mend his ways. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 盗まれたアトムの巻
Astro Boy Stolen
Nusumareta Atom no Maki
episode.summary: It is an injustice that robots should never grow up, thinks a new scientist who has been appointed to the Science Ministry. He puts Atom`s artificial intelligence into the body of an adult robot. Meanwhile someone steals Atom`s body. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: さすらいのロッピの巻
Wandering Roppi
Sasurai no Roppi no Maki
episode.summary: Aliens attack a boy and an old man in the deep woods. After Atom saves them, he learns that the boy Roppi and the old man are also aliens. Roppi tells Atom that he is a prince and that he has run away from his planet. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 幽霊製造機の巻
Ghost Manufacturing Machine
Yuurei Seizouki no Maki
episode.summary: Dictator Hiller takes Dr. Ochanomizu away, and tries to coerce the doctor into making Hiler clones on a massive scale in order to conquer the world. Atom heads to a country called Boruboa to rescue the doctor. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 鞍馬の天狗
Tengu of Kurama
Kurama no Tengu
episode.summary: Robot Tomson, who has the ability to see through objects, sees that most statues of Buddha in Kyoto are fake. Then Atom and his fellows go searching for the real statues, and get surrounded by a group of long-nosed goblins. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 夢を売る宇宙人の巻
The Dream Selling Aliens
Yume o Uru Uchuujin no Maki
episode.summary: The artificial intelligence of all robots goes awry because of some strange radio waves from space. Dr. Ochanomizu, at a loss as to what to do, has to make the difficult decision of cutting the energy supply of all robots... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 狂った国境線の巻
The Crazed Boundary
Kurutta Kokkyousen no Maki
episode.summary: In a terrifying country called Libea, robots are under constant surveillance and are sent to an asylum if they disobey orders. Atom sneaks into the asylum to rescue the oppressed robots. Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ガニメート号の巻
Prisoners in Space
Ganimate Gou no Maki
episode.summary: Atom and Dr. Ochanomizu wander into a space graveyard that lies outside every sphere of gravitation, drifting in space forever. Then an earthling named Bemski, who hates the Earth, rescues them, and... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: 青い鳥物語の巻
Blue Bird Story
Aoi Tori Monogatari no Maki
episode.summary: Whenever it hears small birds crying out for help, a robot named Blue Bird rescues them, sometimes even wrecking a building if necessary. Now Blue Bird is trying to rescue a small bird that has wandered into a nuclear power plant... Source: tezukaosamu.net

episode.title: ドッグ隊長の巻
Captain Dog
Dog Taichou no Maki
episode.summary: Higeoyaji`s pet dog Pero has a diamond that it takes back from space. Then Dr. Fooler puts Pero`s memory into the computer of Captain Dog, the robot dog, to make it find diamonds. Atom follows the robot-dog, which is heading for Mars. Source: tezukaosamu.net
